# The `ShuffleBlockStrategy` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Strategy to randomly select a block and shuffle the operations without affecting data dependency.

Definition at line 194 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getWeight() {#a29d7e196d66b831862e9f221986a66b7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::ShuffleBlockStrategy::getWeight (size&#95;t CurrentSize, size&#95;t MaxSize, uint64&#95;t CurrentWeight)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.

The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of
distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when we start getting close to <code>MaxSize</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h/#l00196">196</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/fuzzmutate/irmutator-h">IRMutator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
